item.title: the future of the Operating System - LinuxCon 2015 keynote
item.description: Given as a keynote at LinuxCon + CloudOpen Japan 2015. Linux has become the foundation for infrastructure everywhere as it defined application portability from the desktop to the phone and from to the data center to the cloud. As applications become increasingly distributed in nature, the Docker platform serves as the cornerstone of Linuxâ€™s evolution solidifying the dominance of Linux today and into tomorrow. Transcript The Future of the Operating System What is an Operating System ?
